title: PiXel ScaLer

ogp-description: An app that resizes pixel art into an illustration-like style.

what-is.heading: What is this
steps: This is a scaling app using xBRjs. It allows you to easily convert pixel art into an illustration-like style.
You may use the converted images freely for personal or commercial purposes within reasonable bounds.

usage.heading: How to Use
steps: Select or drag & drop pixel art to add.
Set the scale percentage (100%–10000%) in the input field.
If scaling original pixel art, set "Pixel" to 1. If scaling already enlarged art, enter the corresponding scale number.
An enlarged, illustration-style image will appear.
Click the Download or ZIP Download button under the image to save it.

tips.heading: Tips
steps: You'll get the best result by converting original-size pixel art.
Low-resolution illustrations (not pixel art) won’t upscale cleanly.
Setting the scale to 100% applies anti-aliasing to pixel art.
Conversion may fail if the specified pixel size does not match the actual pixel size in the image.

version.new-notice: A new version v.{version} is available
